section.name: Modello StAX Plugin
section.p: Modello StAX Plugin generates XML readers and writers based on StAX API, plus reader delegates to be able to read multiple model versions.

subsection.name: stax-reader

li.code:
public RootClass ( Reader reader, boolean strict )
throws IOException, XMLStreamException

public RootClass read( Reader reader )
throws IOException, XMLStreamException

public RootClass read( String filePath, boolean strict )
throws IOException, XMLStreamException

public RootClass read( String filePath )
throws IOException, XMLStreamException

subsection.p: In addition, if multiple model reader versions are generated (each in its own package), it creates a delegate my.model.package.io.xpp3.ModelNameStaxReaderDelegate class with following public methods:

li.code:
public Object read( File f, boolean strict )
throws IOException, XMLStreamException

public Object read( File f )
throws IOException, XMLStreamException

subsection.p: Depending on the model version found in the XML content, the returned Object will be of the right version package.

li.code:
public void write( Writer writer, RootClass root )
throws IOException, XMLStreamException
